channel.title: Anyone use Virtual PCs to run SCAR?
channel.description:
Does anyone here use a program like Virtual PC 2007 or VMWare to run multiple SCAR bots? And if you do - how does it work out? I haven't played RuneScape for years now, but it's something I just want to mess around with, and see how it works out, because I do remember someone mentioning a long time ago that this could be done.
Thanks!
